definition: way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Just a few things off the top of my head regarding upgradable bags.
sentences.chinese: 一些關於揹包升級的想法一直在我腦海裏盤旋。

sentences.english: The failure to appreciate the iPhone was all mine.
sentences.chinese: 這個放棄欣賞iphone的行爲全是我自己的想法。

sentences.english: I've spent my entire adult life doing battle with this idea.
sentences.chinese: 整個成年生活我都在和這個想法作鬥爭。

sentences.english: When you have and hold a need, harken not to others greed.
sentences.chinese: 當你有需求的時候，不要聽從他人貪婪的想法。

sentences.english: I have mixed thoughts on the D-ring which Maxpedition has been using for a while.
sentences.chinese: 我一直對馬蓋先使用的這個D環設計有更多的想法。

sentences.english: But now we are having two kinds of partings .
sentences.chinese: 但現在，我們對臨別卻有兩種不同的想法。

sentences.english: His idea of fun was to fly to Thailand to fight in a kickboxing tournament.
sentences.chinese: 他的想法就是去泰國參加跆拳錦標賽。

sentences.english: The concept of libel does not exist, nor should it.
sentences.chinese: 誹謗的想法不會存在，也不應該存在。

sentences.english: Very well written, the book is packed with clever ideas and fascinating information.
sentences.chinese: 這本書有很好的文筆，聰明的想法以及有趣的信息。

sentences.english: At this moment, an idea came into Tucheng ' s mind, which was to make artificial cultivated land.
sentences.chinese: 此時的土成有一個心願，他萌生了人造耕地的想法。

sentences.english: That's a silliest idea I've ever heard.
sentences.chinese: 那是我聽到過的最愚蠢的想法。

sentences.english: They nix the idea upon learning that DHMO is actually water.
sentences.chinese: 在知道一氧化二氫其實是水以後他們放棄了這種想法。

sentences.english: Drink in the deliciousness of good food and good thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 酒後，在美味的好食物和良好的想法。

sentences.english: You can’t have good ideas unless you’re willing to generate a lot of bad ones.
sentences.chinese: 除非摒棄諸多不良想法纔會有好點子。

sentences.english: Eric Schenk had the idea of adding something to the client's initial sequence number.
sentences.chinese: 埃裏克申的想法增加一些客戶端的初始序列號。

definition: way of looking at a thing/view/opinion/CL:個|个[ge4]
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to burgeon/to produce/to conceive/to be in the initial stage
to imagine/to assume/to envisage/tentative plan/to have consideration for
